tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GovernanceLogs ( 
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    meeting_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    meeting_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    action_taken TEXT, 
    member_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL 
 );

CREATE TABLE logs_of_meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_description TEXT,
    actions_taken TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE governance_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(50),
    member_role VARCHAR(50),
    member_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE governance_meetings (
    meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    meeting_theme VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    meeting_description TEXT,
    attendees_ids JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE action_items (
    item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id UUID REFERENCES governance_meetings(meeting_id),
    item_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    assigned_to VARCHAR(255),
    due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE governance_meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_topic VARCHAR(255),
  meeting_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE governance_members (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(255),
  member_email VARCHAR(255),
  member_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_attendance (
  attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  member_id INT,
  attendance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_actions (
  action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  action_description TEXT,
  action_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_status VARCHAR(50),
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES governance_meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(255),
    discussion_notes TEXT,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES governance_meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES governance_meetings(meeting_id)
);
